query.q: owl_subclass_of(T, knowrob:'StorageConstruct'), class_properties(T, knowrob:'typePrimaryFunction-StoragePlaceFor', knowrob:'Perishable'), owl_individual_of(Obj, T), highlight_object_with_children(Obj).
query.text: What is the storage place for perishable items?
----- Queries on the logged belief state -----

query.q: task_goal(_Task, 'REPLACEABLE-FUNCTION-ROLLING-DEMO'), subtask(_Task, _Sub), subtask(_Sub, _Sub2), owl_has(_Sub2, knowrob:'designator', _Sub3), owl_has(_Sub3, knowrob:'equatedDesignator', DesigId), add_designator_contour_mesh(DesigId).
